string.value: #p2012018# handed me #t4031699#, a more potent medicine for Fairies. Will this finally make Keeny healthy? #p2012018#'s face still seems quite sad, though... anyway, I better give this to #b#p2111004##k.

#p2111004# seemed worried that this medicine might not work, either, and longed for her missing husband. She said as an alchemist from Alcadno, she believed he would have found the cure for his daughter...

Good thing you came. The medicine is now ready. It's #t4031699#, the cure for Fairies. I don't think this is suitable for young kids, but... she'll really need it. Just take this and give it to #b#p2111004##k.

Honestly speaking, I can't guarantee that #p2111005# will be healthy even after this. I heard the mixed ones are the ones that are born the weakest. I wonder how a precious fairy like her fell in love with a man like that. I really can't get it.
Do you have some things to take care of here at #m200000000#? Then take care of your stuff first, then come see me when you have time for some delivery.
Did you... wind up seeing #p2012018#? Ahh... So this is the new one that #p2012018# made. Great work... and I can't thank you enough for helping us once more.
I promised myself not to get weak in times like this, but ... this is precisely the time I miss my husband the most. As an alchemist in Alcadno, he would have been able to cure #p2111005#...
You still haven't gone to see #b#p2111004##k yet? She's very concerned right now. Don't delay by loafing around here. Just go to #b#m261000000##k and give her the medicine.
Have you not gone to #p2012018# yet? Please go see #p2012018# and get a medicine for my dear #p2111005#. Thank you in advance.

What? You lost the #b#t4031699##k that I gave you? What are you thinking? It's important medicine for a life and death situation! I made an extra batch so I'll give you another one, but... (grumbles) Don't lose it again!
